Name: Gisela "Roni” Galante
Description:
The exact cause of Gisela's death was not reported although dismemberment was indicated in the news article. The rest of her body was found several weeks later.

Source: www.liminalis.de and La Calle 19.04.2009

Name: Melek D.
Source ref: tgeu/11 Apr 2009, in own apartment/Melek D.
Description:
The victim was killed in their own apartment. They were also known as Melek K.

TGEU-Mailing-List & Bird of Paradox, 21.04.2009

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was shot dead. She was 40 years old.

Sources: www.liminalis.de and Journal do Brazil, 14.04.2009

Name: Image Devereux
Description:
The body of Jimmy McCollough (performance name Image Devereux) was found on Joseph Street behind the old Club Spektrum in Fayetteville.

www.transgenderdor.org

Name: "Gabriel” Carneiro de Sousa
Description:
Carneiro's age was not reported. She was shot to death.

Sources: www.liminalis.org and Diario do Nordeste, 21.04.2009

Name: Jeva Padilla
Description:
Jeva was was brutally tortured (burned, mutilated genitals and face, then executed with 40 shots).

Sources: MRTV, 23.04.2009 & Al Momento 22.04.2009

Name: "Ramón” Martínez
Description:
Ramon was brutally tortured (burns, severe knife wounds and wrapped in a pink plastic sack).

Sources: MRTV, 23.04.2009 & Al Momento 22.04.2009

Name: Juliana Martins
Description:
Juliana was shot in the stomach at close range.

Sources: www.liminalis.org and Athos GLS, 07.05.2009
